20020411
I'm getting an NPE trying to open the debug perspective
In DebugActionGroupsManager.initialize there are no "debugActionGroups"
so fDebugActionGroupActionIds is not set.
Later in processContributionItems the field is referenced causing an NPE.

java.lang.NullPointerException
